Loss of Containment due to Mechanical Fa.Spare part replacement: Flush and depressurise line. Isolate failed valve . Remove failed valve and install new tubing. Leak and pressure test. Potential sparings include valve/tubing.

Loss of Containment due to Fatigue Failu.Local Consequences: Loss of Containment (in tubing or valve)
Loss of Containment due to Fatigue Failu.Do maintenance repair/modify op procedur: Flush and depressurise line. Isolate failed valve / tubing. Repair failed valve/tubing and install new tubing.Leak and pressure test.
Loss of Containment due to Fatigue Failu.Spare part replacement: Flush and depressurise line. Isolate failed valve . Remove failed valve and install new tubing. Leak and pressure test. Potential sparings include valve/tubing.

Loss of Function due to Failure to Open.Do maintenance repair/modify op procedur: No repair effort required. Designed for 100% redundancy. If the manual valve failed to operate the hydraulic valve on the SSIV would be used for isolation.

Loss of Function due to Failure to Close.Do maintenance repair/modify op procedur: Small leaks would be monitored. No further action if leak remains small and stable.
Loss of Function due to Failure to Close.Whole system replacement: For large LoC to environment valve change-out would be required. Depressurise and flush gas or condensate line. Isolate faulty valve. Disconnect and remove faulty valve assembly. Mount new valve and connect. Re-commission and return to normal operation.

Loss of Function due to Leakage.Do maintenance repair/modify op procedur: Small leaks would be monitored. No further action if leak remains small and stable.
Loss of Function due to Leakage.Whole system replacement: For large LoC to environment valve change-out would be required. Depressurise and flush gas or condensate line. Isolate faulty valve. Disconnect and remove faulty valve assembly. Mount new valve and connect. Re-commission and return to normal operation.
